name: FLYING HEADROID GENKO
description:
If you are a bot shaped like the head of a human and you fly then chances are, you are a member of the noble Flying Headroids! The second is Headroid Genko and his wonder wind!  

Poke the Headroid all over including its extremities. Make the Headroid say anything you want! Amuse guests, take over the world, collect this headroid and it is yours to command! 

Note the grav-vortex balls which form a gravity well above Genko. The sounds are made with ZIM Synth and animated with ZIM Soundwave. Clouds pass by with the aid of ZIM Scroller. Words are ZIM LabelLetters animated with ZIM animate. The text field is a ZIM TextInput right on the canvas.

Collect the whole fleet of Headroids designed by ZIM Founder and inaugural member of the Gadget Minters, Dr Abstract! Find out more about making ZIM NFTs at https://zimjs.com/nft. Find out more about the Gadget Minters at https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters
